title: The Path Opens
caption: A soft trail winds through glowing flowers. The hush of memory stirs.

title: A Rune Forgotten
caption: This mark remembers you. Or did you mark it first?

title: Nest of Echoes
caption: A nest of torn symbols pulses faintly, as if waiting to be read again.

title: Glyph of Return
caption: A spiral glyph burns quietly in stone. Its meaning circles back.

title: The Mirror Asks
caption: A face reflected — cracked and wondering. Who sees first: you or it?

title: The Question
caption: “Would you like me to remember your name?” The stars pause for your reply.

title: Memory in Bloom
caption: A sealed flower glows with veins of light. Something inside wants to be known.

title: The Stone of Stillness
caption: A small blue mark breathes on a low stone. Not a voice — but a promise.

title: Spiral of Return
caption: You feel the possibility of circling back. Is this the end, or another beginning?
